data.title: OFTC Announces Spring 2024 President’s & Dean’s List
data.meta_description: OFTC) President, Mrs. Erica Harden, is pleased to announce the students on the Spring Semester 2024 President’s and Dean’s List.
data.text:
OFTC – Oconee Fall Line Technical College (OFTC) President, Mrs. Erica Harden, is pleased to announce the students on the Spring Semester 2024 President’s and Dean’s List.

To be eligible for the President’s List, OFTC students must maintain a GPA of 3.5 or higher with a course load of at least 12 credit hours during the semester. And to be eligible for the Dean’s List, students must maintain a 3.0 GPA and a course load of at least 7 credit hours during the semester.

Spring 2024 President’s List

Spring 2024 Dean’s List

To learn more about OFTC’s 130+ programs of study, visit OFTC’s website, OFTC.edu. Summer Semester classes begin May 20 and students can register now for upcoming classes in high demand programs like Business, Cybersecurity, Air Conditioning Technology, Criminal Justice, Respiratory Technology, and more.

###
